channel.title: Windows Phone 7 on goParker
channel.description: Recent content in Windows Phone 7 on goParker

item.title: Memory of a Goldfish
item.description: This game was my first foray into Windows Phone 7 development. It is a Silverlight app based on the card game of Memory (as I knew it, though it is also known by many other names according toÂ Wikipedia). The idea is that you turn over the ‘cards’ in pairs; if they match then you get to keep them. If they don’t match then they are flipped back over and you get another try.
